label: Party
comment: The Party class represents an entity such as an organization, or a company that manufactured the product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique identifier assigned to the credential, typically formatted as a URI of the stored credential.
The name of the organization or company, represented as a text string.

referencedBy.comment: The Party entity that issued the product passport.
The Party entity that manufactured the product.
The Party entity responsible for operating the facility.
